alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene; Western Albany; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greene County through 700 PM EDT... At 629 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prattsville, or 10 miles northwest of Hunter, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Hunter, Windham, Prattsville, Preston-Potter Hollow, Cairo, Durham, Ashland, Jewett, Lexington, West Settlement, North Lexington, Maplecrest, Round Top, Sunside, Cairo Junction, Red Falls, Hervey Street, East Jewett, South Durham and Gayhead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central New York.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greene; Western Albany; Western Greene
